Package com.hexaware.dao

Class Dao

java.lang.Object
com.hexaware.dao.Dao
public class Dao extends Object
The Dao class provides methods to interact with the database for Incidents and Reports.

    • searchIncidentByID

      public static Incidents searchIncidentByID(int incidentID) throws SQLException
      Searches for an incident by its ID in the database.
      Parameters:
      incidentID - The ID of the incident to search for
      Returns:
      The incident with the specified ID, or null if not found
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs
